entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
